name: Data Description
content:
Data Description: Stock Market Time Series


Overview

The dataset contains one year of daily stock data for 12 companies across three major sectors: Technology, Finance, and Healthcare.

It captures key trading attributes needed for time series analysis, pattern detection, and predictive modeling.


Columns

  1. Date → Trading day timestamp
  2. Open → Price at market opening
  3. High → Highest price recorded during the trading day
  4. Low → Lowest price recorded during the trading day
  5. Close → Price at market closing
  6. Volume → Total number of shares traded
  7. CompanyName → Name of the company (e.g., Apple, JPMorgan, Pfizer)
  8. Sector → Industry sector of the company (Technology, Finance, Healthcare)


Key Characteristics

  • Time Frame: 1 year (daily frequency)
  • Companies Covered: 12
  • Sectors Covered: Technology, Finance, Healthcare
  • Granularity: Daily stock-level trading data
